snippet.title: SteamWorld Heist: Ultimate Edition Trailer – Out Now on Nintendo Switch!
snippet.description:
Command robot pirates in tactical shootouts in SteamWorld Heist: Ultimate Edition. Out now on Nintendo Switch!

Learn more about SteamWorld Heist: http://imageform.se/game/steamworld-heist/

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/imageform
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/imageform

Trailer theme by the amazing Steam Powered Giraffe: https://www.youtube.com/spgiraffe
